name: Atom
description: Atom is an open source and free text editor developed for compatible use between Windows, Linux and macOS. It was developed by GitHub with embedded Git Control. Atom is a desktop application built using web technologies, Atom is based on Electron or formerly called Atom Shell. It is completely customizable to the core, including making changes to the programs css (cascading style sheet). Atom also has many features and packages like Atom Beautify which actually fixes and makes your code properly laid out. Emmet is also supported which speeds up the process. Atom was initially released 26 February 2014 and the most stable and up to date release was 22 August 2017.
